content.rendered:
The Regal Tub Chair is an elegant tub chair, upholstered in brown faux leather and elegantly styled, with a wooden frame and a dark walnut finish. 

 

It is suitable for a huge variety of settings, including: modern and traditional offices, pubs and restaurants.

Upholstered in brown faux leather, available as shown only.
